ALT+4" end -- left, main, line2 local line3 = "" if size < 4 then line3 ="DISTANCE: "..distance else line3="All Points In!" end -- left, main, line3 line4 = " HELP ALT+1 | SLIDER ALT+7" -- left, main local main = [[

START: ALT+8 | EXIT: ALT+9

-- DU EZ Script by  
-- Version: 1.0
-- Author: Juvenius Drakonius (discord: Juvenius#231)
------------------------------------------------------

-- Parameters 
pause_script_on_start = false --export
help_panel_on_start = true --export
slider_panel_on_start = true --export
clock_rate = 0.01 --export
auto_solve_on_4_points = false --export
pause_script_after_solve = true --export
auto_pause_script_timer = 300 --export
auto_stop_after_pause = 300 --export

-- Default Values
distance = 250 --defaul distance time
list = {} --table of points
size = 0 --table size
time = system.getTime()

unit.setTimer("clock",clock_rate)
player_id = unit.getMasterPlayerId()
player_name = database.getPlayer(player_id)
player_pos_start = system.getPlayerWorldPos(player_id)
--player_pos_start = unit.getMasterPlayerRelativePosition()
system.showScreen(1)
start_splash()

--conversion of parameters
help_tougle = help_panel_on_start
slider_tougle = slider_panel_on_start
pause_tougle = pause_script_on_start 
pause_timer = auto_pause_script_timer
auto_solve_tougle = auto_solve_on_4_points
iddle = time -- iddle time to test auto pause
stop_timer = auto_stop_after_pause
pause_solve_tougle = pause_script_after_solve

-- Add point to table
if size < 4 then
    local d = {}
    local c = system.getPlayerWorldPos(player_id)  
    d.p = vec3(c[1],c[2],c[3])     
    d.r = distance
    list[size] = d
    size = size + 1
    
  elseif size == 3 then 
    
	if auto_solve_tougle == true  then  
        solve_location(list)
        if size == 4 then list = {} end    
     else   
    
      system.print("Ready to Find Node, Press Alt+4")
     --system.print(json.encode(point_list))
    end    
end

-- Delete point from table
if  size > 0 then
  table.remove(list) 
else
  list = {}
end

--pause script
pause_tougle = not pause_tougle
if pause_tougle == false then
   unit.setTimer("clock",clock_rate)
   system.print("EZ Scanner -Resumed-")
end

-- Solve location  
solve_location(list)    

if size == 4 then
	list = {}
	size = 0
end    

if pause_solve_tougle then 
    pause_tougle = pause_solve_tougle 
end

-- distance imput
-- scrollwheel aceleration
-- distance contraints
-- auto pause timer
time = system.getTime()

if pause_tougle == false then
    local mouse = system.getThrottleInputFromMouseWheel()
    
    if distance ~= (distance + mouse)then
        local delta = round(system.getTime()-iddle,2)         --scrollwheel aceleration
        local factor = 1 

        if delta < 0.08 then factor = 2 end 
        
        if delta < 0.04 then factor = 20 end  
        
        local d = distance + factor * mouse

        if d > 400 then          --distance constraints
               distance = 400
            elseif d < 0 then 
                 distance = 0
            else 
                 distance = round(d,0)
        end
       
        iddle = system.getTime() --time last to move      
        
      else    
         local t =  time - iddle --iddle timer pause    
        
         if t > pause_timer then 
            pause_tougle = true 
            iddle = system.getTime()
         end  --system.print(t.." - "..pause_timer)       
    end

 else    
         local t =  time - iddle --iddle timer pause 
         if t > stop_timer then script_exit() end           
end

-- FUNCTION LIBRARY

-- place holder for start slash
function start_splash() 
end    

-- Solve location table to coordinate link
function solve_location(list)
    --does not return error on bad table or size  
    
    if size == 4 then
        p1 = list[0].p
        r1 = list[0].r
        p2 = list[1].p
        r2 = list[1].r
        p3 = list[2].p
        r3 = list[2].r
        p4 = list[3].p
        r4 = list[3].r 

        result = trilaterate(p1, r1, p2, r2, p3, r3, p4, r4)

        local x = math.floor(result.x)
        local y = math.floor(result.y)
        local z = math.floor(result.z)
        position = xyz_to_pos(x,y,z)
        system.setWaypoint(position)

        system.print("<text style='color:#eca943'>┍━━━━━NODE LOCATION━━━━━┑</text>")
        system.print(position)
        system.print("<text style='color:#eca943'>┕━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┙</text>")
        system.print("<text style='color:white'>SCRIPT PAUSED | START ALT+8 | EXIT ALT+9</text>")

    else
        local msg
        if #list == 3 then
            msg = "1 More point neededto find location "    
        else    
            msg = 4-#table.." More points needed to find location " 
        end   
        system.print(msg)   
    end
end

-- timer for tics
function ticker(r) 
    local c = round(system.getTime(),0)
    if c % r == 0 then 
        return true
      else
	   return false
    end
end    

-- script exit
function script_exit() 
    system.print("[ EZ Scaner is off ]")
    unit.exit()
end   

-- distance horizontal line transform 
function distance_line_transform(x)
  y = 0.02 + 0.253*x + -1.13E-04*x^2    
  return y
end

-- UPGRADE TO MORE PLANETS
-- make link out of x,y,z coord
function xyz_to_pos (x,y,z,planet,system)
  local system = tostring(0)  
  local planet = tostring(0)
  local r = [[::pos{]]..system..[[,]]..planet..[[,]]..
    tostring(x) .. ',' .. 
    tostring(y) .. ',' .. 
    tostring(z) .. '}';
  return r
end

--round funcion
function round(num, numDecimalPlaces)
  if numDecimalPlaces and numDecimalPlaces>0 then
    local mult = 10^numDecimalPlaces
    return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
  end
  return math.floor(num + 0.5)
end

--trilaterate funcion
function trilaterate(p1, r1, p2, r2, p3, r3, p4, r4)
    local r1s, r2s, r3s = r1*r1, r2*r2, r3*r3  
    local v2 = p2 - p1
    local ax = v2:normalize()
    local U = v2:len()
    local v3 = p3 - p1
    local ay = (v3 - v3:project_on(ax)):normalize()
    local v3x, v3y = v3:dot(ax), v3:dot(ay)
    local vs = v3x*v3x + v3y*v3y
    local az = ax:cross(ay)  
    local x = (r1s - r2s + U*U) / (2*U) 
    local y = (r1s - r3s + vs - 2*v3x*x)/(2*v3y)
    local m = r1s - (x^2) - (y^2) 
    if m < 0.0000001 then m = 0 end
    local z = math.sqrt(m)
    local t1 = p1 + ax*x + ay*y + az*z
    local t2 = p1 + ax*x + ay*y - az*z
  
    if math.abs((p4 - t1):len() - r4) < math.abs((p4 - t2):len() - r4) then
      return t1
    else
      return t2
    end
  end
